name: DittoKit
summary: Ditto lets you sync without the internet
description:
DittoKit is an SDK that helps you build incredible data sync applications.
Sync JSON-like data structures with other devices over WiFi, Servers,
WiFi Direct, and even Bluetooth LE, all without worrying about the
complexities of building a multipeer application.

user_target_xcconfig.EXCLUDED_ARCHS__EFFECTIVE_PLATFORM_SUFFI: arm64 arm64e armv7 armv7s armv6 armv8
